MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL41 postcode area of Blaenau Ffestiniog, affecting properties in Gellilydan and surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:00PM due to repairs required following tree damage. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:03PM on 27th December 2020.
